description:
Two snowball-hurling snowman brothers power their way through against various enemies. A blast from the past, Nick & Tom are back in this fun and easy-to-play action platformer!

• The classic arcade platform game first released in 1990 by Toaplan in a new version with remastered graphics and music.   
• Contains the 50 levels from the original + 30 new levels.
• Play alone or together with a friend to save Snow Land from the evil King Artich.
name: Snow Bros. Nick & Tom Special
